amendment.description: Amendment urges the Secretary of Agriculture to use ethanol, biodiesal, and other alternative fuels to the maximum extent practicable to meet USDA's fuel needs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 72 printed in the Congressional Record urging the Secretary of Agriculture to use ethanol, biodiesal, and other alternative fuels to the maximum extent practicable to meet USDA's fuel needs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
